idea:
- We are a growing import export company with a passion to provide business solutions to our clients. Our business has been inspired by the government’s initiative and vision to improve the field of import export. Innovative ideas will be introduced to ensure that you get a seamless and agile business experience, without a compromise on the quality you receive.

                 Our focus is more on five key values. Transparency – We operate with a complete transparency with our product delivery and pricing. Quality – No compromise on product quality. You get a class product which has gone through vigorous testing to meet the quality standards. Commitment – We are committed to deliver your requirements as per your needs. Our passion towards what we do, drives our commitment. Honesty – Our most important value is honesty. Our honesty is co-related to our transparency value. Vision – Our vision is clear, to be capable enough to deliver any product requirement of our client. Growth of our client is our upmost priority. We strongly believe that our client’s and our growth is a parallel affair.

                     Our company is a partnership firm. One partner is a graduate from United Kingdom university and with many years of experience in MNC company. And the other partner is established and accomplished businessman for many years. Together we wish to bring our expertise to the table, which is the world of import export.
name: Ark Prism

idea:
GODSPEED - OUR STORY BEGINS WITH A COMMITMENT TO YOU
Godspeed is the brainchild of a few industry expert, who after dedicating decades of their expertise, felt is the time to pay-back to the society and to stand for the customers who find it difficult to choose from the various plans available in the market, because insurance is not about buying a policy but much more beyond that. It is the expertise to help the client properly assess their insurance needs, shop for the best value in insurance coverage and help the client in managing their claims.
GODSPEED, has therefore been conceived as an insurance broking firm with a vision to create a knowledge leader. Maybe that is the reason we have some of the best talents this industry has ever seen.
Our team comes with a "“can- do- it” attitude, which makes no task too difficult to achieve hence only we would strive to offer the most optimal solutions and build our reputation by ensuring long term solutions and benefits for our clients - we promise to offer a holistic service spectrum to our clients and deliver services with an assurance of seamless end-to-end claim servicing experience.
Our Clients can rely on us to protect their assets, employees, liability exposures and can continue to focus on their respective core areas.
We have been able to design customised products for our clients and have established a track record of representing our clients fairly and aggressively in claim settlements as-well.
Forget off-the-shelf solutions.
Get expertly crafted solutions that meet your unique needs. Our consultative approach makes us the right partner for you, and the people you count on – Hum Hain Naa @ Godspeed – Service Beyond Insurance.
name: GODSPEED INSURANCE BROKING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Kalpataru polymer Private Limited is is an information technology startup to provide plastic scrap recycling industry information via its brand name Plastic-ScrapWala.

It is an early-stage, technology start-up founded to support businesses in the plastic recycling industry in India. By providing access to business-critical information and market linkages, we equip players with the tools to make better decisions that will grow their businesses. Thus, this platform is revolutionising the plastic recycling space by providing a free flow of information, fostering a flourishing marketplace and meeting all the needs of these players through one application.


Our mobile application unites all participants for all types of plastics including, PP, PET, HDPE, LDPE, LLDPE, PVC, HIPS, ABS, and Polyester and throughout the plastic recycling supply chains such as Scrap Suppliers, Traders, Dana Manufacturers, and Recycled Finished Product Manufacturers. 


On our platform, participants gain access to- 

1. Domestic Prices and News to improve negotiation, latest market updates and get immediate price confirmations 

2. International Price and News to learn about upcoming trends and demand-supply situation (including Oil and Currency fluctuations)

3. Live Buy-Sell offers (zero commission) with a pan-India reach

4. Directory with 3000+ contacts of verified buyers and seller across India

5. Online Exhibitions across used machinery, raw materials, and products to save on marketing and procurement expenses.
name: Kalpataru Polymer Private limited (Plastic-ScrapWalaÃ¢ÂÂ¢)
